about_the_game:
This is a first person shooter game This game has two game modes, one is the challenge mode and the other is the endless mode. The two modes have two different independent systems.

      The challenge mode can earn currency by killing monsters, and then use coins to purchase items and weapons in the tablet's marketplace. Of course, one can also use a portion of their own belongings to trade with gods and obtain props. The challenge mode only requires resisting a certain number of monster attacks to activate the BOSS level.

      Endless mode only has endless monsters. Players can upgrade by killing monsters, then earn lottery points and skill points, and enhance their strength by winning attributes and weapons through lottery; Learn skills through a skill tree to acquire special skills.

      The weapons in both modes are the same. There are different types of weapons, and only one of the same type can be owned at a time. In the challenge mode, you can switch back to other weapons of the same type that you already have through the store, but not in the endless mode.So please be careful when drawing prizes.

      Although the monsters in both modes are the same, our monsters are unique.They have different behaviors and skills.Every monster possesses at least one skill, so even when facing ordinary monsters, be careful and vigilant.
      Finally, as this is a preliminary version, there is no further content worth explaining yet.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a game that uses guns to fight monsters, so there may be some bloody and violent scenes. At the same time, some items in the game may also have sexual implications

detailed_description:
This is a first person shooter game This game has two game modes, one is the challenge mode and the other is the endless mode. The two modes have two different independent systems.

      The challenge mode can earn currency by killing monsters, and then use coins to purchase items and weapons in the tablet's marketplace. Of course, one can also use a portion of their own belongings to trade with gods and obtain props. The challenge mode only requires resisting a certain number of monster attacks to activate the BOSS level.

      Endless mode only has endless monsters. Players can upgrade by killing monsters, then earn lottery points and skill points, and enhance their strength by winning attributes and weapons through lottery; Learn skills through a skill tree to acquire special skills.

      The weapons in both modes are the same. There are different types of weapons, and only one of the same type can be owned at a time. In the challenge mode, you can switch back to other weapons of the same type that you already have through the store, but not in the endless mode.So please be careful when drawing prizes.

      Although the monsters in both modes are the same, our monsters are unique.They have different behaviors and skills.Every monster possesses at least one skill, so even when facing ordinary monsters, be careful and vigilant.
      Finally, as this is a preliminary version, there is no further content worth explaining yet.
name: Eliminate Fear
short_description: A first person shooter game where you can fight monsters, buy guns, buy props, explore, and play cards (not yet finished)
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Arabic, Korean, Traditional Chinese
